name: Super Ultra Mythic Judo Fight Arcade Remix Hyper Edition
name_original: Super Ultra Mythic Judo Fight Arcade Remix Hyper Edition
description:
Defeat your enemies in an epic judo fight or practice your skills at grabs, defense and quick attacks.

You can´t jump, you can´t run, you can´t hide.

Player 1 uses "A" for defense, "S" for quick attacks and "D" for grabs, Player 2 uses "Right" for defense, "Down" for quick attacks and "Left" for grabs.

Start with any key of by clicking the screen.

 #FlaSports #PC

Omar Antonio Chávez Ortega- Programmer

Aideé Pfau Teshiba- Artist

Unreal Engine

Morelia, Michoacán, México
